text: Hagi antahiho, tumpamo mago'a zaga azerinaku ageko'na eri fafukiteno ame huno hareno eramino ageko'nareti eme rufiteaza hu'za, ha' vahe'mo'za e'za Bozra kumate vahera eme zamazeri haviza hugahaze. Ana'ma hanage'za Idomu vahe'mokizmi harafa sondia vahe'mo'za a'nemo'za mofavre antenaku nehazageno zamata negrige'za koro nehazankna hu'za koro hugahaze.
